# ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment.vertical

**Case**

The plane is parallel to gravity.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAnchor/transform] property for a vertical plane anchor includes a rotation component. That is, the transform matrix represents the result of rotating a horizontal plane to match the orientation of the detected surface.

## Alignment Values

- **ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment.horizontal**: The plane is perpendicular to gravity.
